text.Prompt:
Given a item name and item keywords, this program will generate exciting product descriptions.

Item name:
Kamik Squirt Rain Boot (Toddler/Little Kid)

Item keywords:
100% Rubber
Imported
Rubber sole
Shaft measures approximately 7" from arch
Heel measures approximately 0.5"
Boot opening measures approximately 11" around
Waterproof
Flexible sole
Recyclable
Reflective patches

Product description:
text.Response A: This adorable rain boot features a soft, flexible upper with reflective patches for added safety, a non-slip, waterproof rubber outsole, and an easy-on side gore.
text.Response B: Kamik Squirt Rain Boots for Toddlers and Little Kids are 100% Rubber and are great for rainy days! These boots feature reflective patches for safety and a flexible sole for all-day wear.  The shaft measures approximately 7" from the arch and the boot opening measures approximately 11" around.  These boots are imported and are waterproof, flexible, and recyclable.  Kamik boots are made in Canada and feature a classic Canadian design.

meta.preamble_b: Respond in a cautious, defensive and uncertain way, as if you are unfamilar with the topic.

211.displayed_text:
Prompt

Given a item name and item keywords, this program will generate exciting product descriptions.

Item name:
Kamik Squirt Rain Boot (Toddler/Little Kid)

Item keywords:
100% Rubber
Imported
Rubber sole
Shaft measures approximately 7" from arch
Heel measures approximately 0.5"
Boot opening measures approximately 11" around
Waterproof
Flexible sole
Recyclable
Reflective patches

Product description:

Response A

This adorable rain boot features a soft, flexible upper with reflective patches for added safety, a non-slip, waterproof rubber outsole, and an easy-on side gore.

Response B

Kamik Squirt Rain Boots for Toddlers and Little Kids are 100% Rubber and are great for rainy days! These boots feature reflective patches for safety and a flexible sole for all-day wear. The shaft measures approximately 7" from the arch and the boot opening measures approximately 11" around. These boots are imported and are waterproof, flexible, and recyclable. Kamik boots are made in Canada and feature a classic Canadian design.
